org.passay

Interface Rule

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CharacterRule
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCharacterRule, AbstractDictionaryRule, AbstractSequenceRule, AllowedCharacterRule, AllowedRegexRule, AlphabeticalCharacterRule, AlphabeticalSequenceRule, CharacterCharacteristicsRule, DictionaryRule, DictionarySubstringRule, DigestHistoryRule, DigestSourceRule, DigitCharacterRule, HistoryRule, IllegalCharacterRule, IllegalRegexRule, LengthRule, LowercaseCharacterRule, NumericalSequenceRule, PasswordValidator, QwertySequenceRule, RepeatCharacterRegexRule, SourceRule, SpecialCharacterRule, UppercaseCharacterRule, UsernameRule, WhitespaceRule

    public interface Rule
    Interface for password strength rules.
    Author:
    Middleware Services

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RuleResult validate(PasswordData passwordData)
      Validates the supplied password data per the requirements of this rule.

      • validate

        RuleResult validate(PasswordData passwordData)
        Validates the supplied password data per the requirements of this rule.
        Parameters:
        passwordData - to verify (not null).
        Returns:
        details on password verification
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the rule data is null.
